Se vai jogar de sobrevivente, divirta-se, mas se for the killer pode esquecer.
O jogo é 100% survivor side, com uma tonelada de 
pallet safe (the game btw), 
swf, 
tela esticada,
speed hack,
e o melhor de tudo, se estiver perdendo de sobrevivente é só quitar, a punição é minima.
O jogo já foi bom, agora ta injogável.

NEVER get this game unless you are a bad player and you want to feel good about yourself and you want to feel like you are a good player. All you gotta do to get rank 1 is be a killer. This is the most unbalanced POS game out there right now. The devs of this game are all killer mains and it shows. Every update buffs killers and nerfs survivors..... So unbalanced its retarded.... Back when the game first released, it was actually balanced and fun. All that has gone away. HIGHY RECCOMEND TO STAY AWAY FROM THIS SHIT GAME!!! I feel bad for myself for how many hours I've wasted in this pos you call a game..... SAVE YOURSELF AND YOUR MONEY!!! 46 hours of playtime, & I still feel the same way about this game..... It's booty..
This game is what it feels like to be in a love hate relationship. 11/10.

its a good game but most killers tend to tunnel players a lot camp at those who are on the hook and use cheater pecks way to much making it unfair nor fun to play, as well as they miss use cheater perks and doesnt give others a chance to enjoy or even play at all.  when you have a decent killer its fun and enjoy able but thats rare in a day. other then that its pretty good game

Sinceramente a pesar de la polemica que pueda generar el juego sobre si esta del lado del Killer o los Survivors, es un buen juego y mas si lo juegas con amigos, lo unico malo son los bugs tras cada update, en general es entretenido y si lo juegas trata de no tomarte las cosas muy en serio las actitudes que a veces tienen los Killers.

このゲームはサバイバーなら友達と協力してできるしキラーでも1人でできるのでいいです。
そしてキラーから逃げ切ったりサバイバーを全滅させたときは自分が上達したな～と達成感が得られるのでいいです
さらにいろいろなアップデートをして様々なキャラが出てくるのでこれからも楽しめると思います。
If you want to have anger issues when watching horror movies, play this game.

I am a 45 yo father, probably one of the oldest people playing this game. I am a single farther to my Son, who is 14 now. My son got this game for Christmas in 2021 from his uncle, so we installed it on his computer and he started playing. By the end of the week he had 24 hours on this game. This was horrible for me, as it was already hard for me to find ways to spend time with my son, as he is always out with his friends or just watching YouTube. So I decided to make a Steam account and get this game to see if I could maybe play alongside him. I loaded into the game, picked my character and started playing but I was stuck on what you where supposed to do. I asked my Son for help and he hosted a game for me to join. I loved it as it was the best time I had spent with my Son since my wife had died. This game has ever since brought me and my son closer again and now we actually spend time together outside the house together as well. This game reminded me that there's fun to be had in everything, and it has brought both me and my Son many happy memories. h

This game is a dope game , best coop game

I bought the game hoping I would be matchmaking the whole time, my hopes became a reality.

In all honesty though, it is impressive to have a such a big game with this large of a following and still not have the drive to fix the game in any way shape or form. BHVR genuinely thinks that they can apply scotch tape to every crack and crevice and hope that the game doesn't fall apart, and instead of fixing features that have been broken in the game since release, they add more crap on top of it.

"But you have a bunch of hours how can you vote negative?!"

Because I care about the game, it's easier to see the potential in this game than it is actually having a good time on it. Sure I may have loved it upon release when there was a window of opportunity (ha) to actually change and update the game in a beneficial way. But after countless years of doing absolutely nothing to the base formula, it's obvious that they have no intentions of ever making the game different than it is currently, and that will never change no matter how many killers or survivors they add.
Its a good game, its a little toxic but most games are. Play it, and face camp

This is a cool horror game, but only if you play as a killer. I'm constantly paranoid that I will get 4-man squad that will bully me into oblivion and have the audacity to call me toxic because I accidentally camped the hook for 0.0000000001 seconds.

10/10 best horror experience I've had
Game just keeps getting better and better

Un-nerf Decisive Strike.  Here's a list of things you can nerf instead:

Killer's ability to slug
Killer's ability to tunnel
Killer's ability to camp hooked survivors
The nightmare

Keys

Instead of taking popular good perks and making them shit, what about leaving good perks alone and improve bad ones?

I guess if you're into the horror genre I could see the appeal. But its boring to me.... Hit space bar every once in a while to do a "skill check" and play hide and seek... Monsters are OP so they usually just end up "choosing who to chase" you read it all the time in the FB posts or for some reason they "let people go"..... so whats the point than? I don't get it.

great game to play with friends

Game can either be very fun or absolutely boring and tedious. It all depends on the type of players you play with. When people are playing to have fun and not taking the game hostage it's a great game! But be warned, there are many people who love to be toxic on both the survivor and killer side; sometimes even your own team mates to you. I enjoy the essence and core of this game very much; but the developers still have a lot of work to do to change the dynamics of people ruining the game's experience for others; a good start being actually having their customer support do something when they're reached out to or taking reports sent in on other players seriously and actually enforcing discipline instead of just ignoring any issues and sending generic "we apologize and are looking into it!!!"
